domain.name: TV Shows
domain.description: Television shows from around the world

entity.name: Hospital
entity.description: This documentary tells the story of the NHS in unprecedented times, going inside different hospitals across the United Kingdom to show the public the true realities of the British healthcare system. Each episode delves into the lives of the patients, and the show also gives viewers a unique look into the complex decisions that hard-working medical professionals have to make daily. All of this while they battle to save lives and fight for patients to have the treatment that they desperately need.

entity.name: Coronavirus Special: Episode 1
entity.description: The NHS is facing its greatest crisis since it began, with more A&E admissions than hospitals can handle. Afforded extensive behind the scenes access, this documentary series goes inside some of the biggest and busiest NHS Trusts in Liverpool to show the public the true realities of the British healthcare system. Each episode delves into the lives of the patients, and the show also gives viewers a unique look into the complex decisions made by hard-working medical professionals every day.

entity.name: COVID-19: Latest news updates from around the world
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

entity.name: Coronavirus: Human trials for experimental vaccine begin in the US
entity.description:
Pharmaceutical companies Pfizer and BioNTech confirmed the start of human trials for a potential coronavirus vaccine. If successful, the vaccine could be in "emergency use" starting in September, officials say.

🌍Updates: 15 NY children diagnosed with syndrome possibly tied to COVID-19

text:
Tonight's #Hospital special on @BBCTwo is a must-watch, following @RoyalFreeNHS staff from day one in the fight against #COVID19.

The care & commitment of staff in such challenging circumstances is extraordinary. If you aren't watching - switch over now. 
https://t.co/qaJ6oFmWkX
